jump_scares.spoiler: Olivia turns around and bumps into Ronnie
Olivia walks back into the now empty room, she turns around and sees the group standing in front of her with creepy smiles
Markie opens the door loudly starling Olivia
The elderly woman from the hospital suddenly appears on screen accompanied by a sound effect
The elderly woman suddenly grabs Brad around the head
Giselle knocks on the car window
A man grabs Olivia around the neck
